message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $105?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can do $115, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
I'm getting close, but I still think I can get a better deal. How about $100?
